Description of incident: Time Warner Cable discovered that their online systems were hacked compromising the username and passwords of approximately 320,000 of its customers. "The telecommunications giant says the FBI informed it of the apparent breach. As a precaution, the company is now contacting affected customers to advise them to change their account passwords."More information: http://www.foxnews.com/tech/2016/01/08/time-warner-cable-says-320000-cus...
